computation.title: BIM & Computation
computation.description: The BIM + Computation team enables better outcomes for projects by giving stakeholders the insight and tools to more efficiently plan, design, construct, and manage buildings and infrastructure.
computation.servicename1text: NEXT creates BIM strategies to get your organization up and running no matter the level of experience. We specialize in designing and deploying custom BIM architectures that enable data flows and arm you with the knowhow to maximize your potential.
computation.servicename2text: NEXT produces well thought-out project execution plans for your project teams with clarity in scope of work, milestones, timelines, and well-defined collaborative processes. We advise your teams on data management, resourcing, and project health to guide them in meeting project goals.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: At the intersection of design and experience, the Simulation team help to identify, implement and manage the technologies that enable more effective coordination, communication and collaboration.
experience.servicename1text: NEXT crafts in the most powerful content formats in storytelling, empowering you to transport viewers to the center of your narrative. We help you build highly immersive experiences of your design scenarios or real-world events.
experience.servicename2text: NEXT creates entire worlds out of nothing in virtual reality. By fusing them with real world scenarios we empower your users to re-imagine the present. NEXT engineers physics into virtual experiences enabling your users to interact with them, transforming them from passive viewers into active participants in your experience.
experience.servicename3text: NEXT loves getting physical and we do it by working with you and blending our technology magic with our 3D Printers to produce physical, beautiful and highly detailed models to life for your project. We want you to visualize exactly what your project will look like to allow for informed and engaging decision making.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: The Innovation team aim to radically improve the way we design by rethinking how we integrate technology and data into our process.
innovation.servicename1text: NEXT provides strong product leadership and strategic guidance when evaluating the challenges and goals of your application. We strive to deliver the highest quality products and solutions for your project.
innovation.servicename2text: We create elegant, engaging, and innovative designs that elevate your brand and reinforce your vision. Design is more than just making a pretty things. We make impactful, intuitive experiences that will give your audience exactly what youâ€™re looking for.
innovation.servicename3text: We harness data, analytics, and design to give your organization a clear path to improve performance and make impactful decisions.
